item.title: Radiant Capital Attacker Sells 2496 ETH at an Average Price of $4741
item.description: On August 14th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, the exploiters of Radiant Capital sold 2,496 ETH at a price of $4,741, and this was exchanged for DAI worth $11.83 million. The platform was hacked on October 17, 2024, and a loss of $53 million occurred.

item.title: MyStonks has issued an announcement regarding cooperation with a regulatory investigation and ensuring the security of funds for regular users.
item.description: August 14th, The MyStonks platform announced that it has recently received a law enforcement request from a U.S. regulatory agency in relation to a single user, which involves multiple special investigations such as anti-money laundering, fraud syndicates, drug trafficking, sanctions evasion, and suspicious activity reports (SAR). This investigation is specifically targeted at a single user and does not impact the platform's other users' deposit and withdrawal operations. The platform's business operation remains normal. As a fully compliant and regulated digital asset platform, MyStonks has obtained the U.S. FinCEN Money Service Business License (MSB) and has completed the SEC Security Token Offering (STO) filing. The platform's compliance department has reached out to the involved user through secure channels and guided them to complete the relevant compliance information submission. All user information is strictly confidential and is only used and shared within the legal limits.M

item.title: A certain swing trader sold 10,000 ETH at an average price of $3,835 one week ago and bought back at an average price of $4,715 8 hours ago.
item.description: On August 14th, according to the on-chain data analyst Yujin Monitoring. A week ago (August 7th), an ETH whale address sold 10,256 ETH on the blockchain and exchanged it for 39.336 million USDT, with an average price of $3,835. Eight hours ago, they purchased 10,730 ETH back on the blockchain using 50.596 million USDT, at an average price of $4,715.

item.title: Ark Invest's multiple funds bought 2,532,000 shares of BLSH, worth $172 million.
item.description: On August 14th, based on the daily data of Ark Invest, Cathie Wood's Ark Invest funds purchased a total of 2,532,693 shares of Bullish (BLSH) yesterday. The calculation was based on a closing price of $68. The current value of their position is $172.2 million. The details are as follows:ARKK purchased 1,714,522 shares of BLSH.ARKW bought 545,416 shares of BLSH.ARKF bought 272,755 shares of BLSH.

item.title: A certain mysterious whale address has once again accumulated 33,402 ETH in the past 3 hours.
item.description: On August 14th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a certain mysterious whale address has once again created 2 new wallets within the past 3 hours, amassing 33,402 ETH (valued at approximately $1.58 billion).Over the past 10 days, they have accumulated 379,317 ETH (approximately $1.8 billion) from FalconX, GalaxyDigital, and BitGo.

item.title: Trader Eugene: Closed most of the ETH long positions, switched to capital preservation mode
item.description: On August 14th, Trader Eugene Ng Ah Sio posted on his personal channel and said, "I have closed the majority of my ETH positions here in order to significantly reduce the exposure to risks. Even though I cannot predict how crazy the market will become, multiple warning signs are flashing before my eyes."The strategy of initially going long on ETH at $2500 has been completely realized, capturing both rounds of the upward trend (from $2500 to $4000, and then from $4000 to $4800). If there is a third round of upward movement (if the assumption becomes a reality), at that time, there will be a frenzied scene where traditional financial funds continuously flow into ETH, with a high market consensus. Although this scenario is not impossible, for traders who focus on capital protection, the risk-reward ratio of continuing to hold aggressive long positions is no longer attractive.While I still hold tactical long positions in other small-cap coins, I have fully reduced my position size and

item.title: Bitcoin Breaks $124,000 Mark Briefly, Setting New All-Time High
item.description: On August 14th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly rose above $124,000 and reached a new all-time high of $124,051. Currently, it is trading at $123,930 with a 24-hour gain of 3.29%.

item.title: Bullish (BLSH) Surges 83.78% on Listing Day, Reaching a Trading Volume of $5.176 Billion
item.description: On August 14th, according to data from rockflow (with the URL https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats and targeted at _blank), the cryptocurrency exchange platform Bullish (BLSH) witnessed an 83.78% increase on its first day of trading in the US stock market. The closing price was $68, the market value was $9.94 billion, the trading volume was $5.176 billion, and the turnover rate was 185.45%. In after-hours trading, BLSH rose by another 11.18% and is currently trading at $75.6.

item.title: GalaxyDigital's affiliated address has deposited 125 million U into Hyperliquid over the past 2 days, purchased spot assets, and engaged in a short position hedge.
item.description: On August 14th, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, a certain wallet address affiliated with GalaxyDigital (0xcaC1) deposited 125 million USDC into Hyperliquid in the past two days. Subsequently, it purchased ETH, HYPE, BTC, PUMP, and FARTCOIN spot. At the same time, it shorted BTC, ETH, DOGE, PUMP, FARTCOIN, and S for hedging purposes.

item.title: Ethereum Ecosystem Leads Altcoins, ARB Surges Over 18%
item.description: On August 14th, based on HTX market data, with Bitcoin and the total crypto market cap reaching a new all-time high, Ethereum is now only 2.7% away from its own all-time high. The Ethereum ecosystem has driven a general increase in altcoins, including:- GTC with a 24-hour change of 37.9% and a current price of $0.431.- ARB having a 24-hour change of 18.64% and a current price of $0.5697.- EIGEN with a 24-hour change of 17.47% and a current price of $1.652.- ZK with a 24-hour change of 15.24% and a current price of $0.0697.- ETHFI with a 24-hour change of 12.52% and a current price of $1.376.- OP with a 24-hour change of 9.77% and a current price of $0.865.
